mapper.select: SELECT dictId, `name`, label, remark, createTime, createUserId, createUserName, updateTime FROM dict WHERE dictId = #{dictId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT dictId, `name`, label, remark, createTime, updateTime FROM dict WHERE deleted = 0
AND (name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR label LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
ORDER BY dictId DESC
